ABSmodJ
Class TriangularVariate

java.lang.Object
  ABSmodJ.TriangularVariate

public class TriangularVariate
extends java.lang.Object

This class allows the creation of Triangular Random Number Generator.

Generating random numbers for a random variable (referred to as trn) with a triangular distribution can be performed by transforming a continuous uniform variable in the range 0 to 1 (referred to as urn). Given a random number urn, generated using a uniform random number generator and the three parameters of the triangular distribution (min, mode, max), the random trn of the triangular distribution can be generated using: 

             urn=rnd();    // rnd() is a uniform random number generator
             if(urn <= (mode-min)/(max-min))
               trn=min+sqrt(urn*(max-min)*(mode-min));
             else
               trn=max-sqrt((1-urn)*(max-min)*(max-mode));
 <\pre><\code>








Author:

  
Gilbert
